app_descript:
Brief:

The "COVID Alert PA" app, designed for Pennsylvanians, stands out as a technological ally in the fight against COVID-19 by leveraging data privacy-centered exposure notifications. This app embodies a proactive approach to health monitoring and community safety, empowering users with timely information should they have been near a COVID-19 positive individual.
